newsitem.title: USA: Dow lower on weak bond market.
newsitem.headline: Dow lower on weak bond market.

text.p: Blue chip stocks fell on Monday, extending the previous session's losses as investors warily watched a weak bond market after strong economic data released on Friday sparked inflation fears and spooked markets.
The Dow Jones industrial average fell 50 points to 8,143, at 10:06 a.m. EDT (1406 GMT), which activated the New York Stock Exchange's limits on program trading.
